author: Michel_Ange
title: A cute and nicely built addition to any submarine scene
review:
A pretty straightforward and sturdy build in line with the good old Lego tradition. The body is twice the length of a minifig, which makes it exactly to scale with an adult narwhal, and its shape conveys exactly the right amount of rounded chunkiness you'd expect from such an animal. The fins allow for some limited poseability. The big sleepy eyes are a break from reality, but they make it look so cute !

The piece selection is of course limited, but very sensible and easy to reuse.

To sum it up, for it's size it is a very good little set, and a perfect addition to any arctic or undersea scene.
